title: Awesome List Updates on May 02, 2021

items.title: Awesome Static Website Services
items.content_text:
### Functions as a Service

*   [Vercel](https://vercel.com/home#features) - Vercel lets people write functions as a service in their language of choice and deploy as part of a monorepo.
items.content_html:
Functions as a Service

  • Vercel - Vercel lets people write functions as a service in their language of choice and deploy as part of a monorepo.

items.title: Awesome Cpp
items.content_text:
### Asynchronous Event Loop

*   [Ichor (⭐224)](https://github.com/volt-software/ichor) - An event queue which focuses on thread safety and provides dependency injection. \[MIT]
items.content_html:
Asynchronous Event Loop

  • Ichor (⭐224) - An event queue which focuses on thread safety and provides dependency injection. [MIT]

items.title: Awesome List
items.content_text:
### Databases

items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome Wordpress Gatsby
items.content_text:
### Paid Tutorials / Courses / Other helpful Plugins

*   2021.01: [Building a Headless WordPress Site with Gatsby](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/building-a-headless-wordpress-site-with-gatsby) - This course is a step-by-step walk through using gatsby-source-wordpress plugin to create a fully functional headless Gatsby WordPress site with posts, pages, categories, tags, post navigation and other features.
items.content_html:
Paid Tutorials / Courses / Other helpful Plugins

  • 2021.01: Building a Headless WordPress Site with Gatsby - This course is a step-by-step walk through using gatsby-source-wordpress plugin to create a fully functional headless Gatsby WordPress site with posts, pages, categories, tags, post navigation and other features.

items.title: Awesome React Components
items.content_text:
### Form Components / Select

*   [react-column-select (⭐14)](https://github.com/chr-ge/react-column-select) - A column select component built for react.
items.content_html:
Form Components / Select

  • react-column-select (⭐14) - A column select component built for react.
